review: Using this to view HD video over a home WiFi network doesn't seem to work .  The host computer and the HD monitor are both on the household WiFi channel.  My guess is that the signal has to be sent first to the host computer and then, again, to the device into which the Chromecast is attached.  This double stream appears to swamp even my N-type WiFi configuration.  Perhaps I'm missing something in the configuration, but I can't get it to work at reasonable speed.  Using a wire instead of Chromecast works fine.
